if you're visiting berlin germany for the first 
time museum island is a good place to start

this museum complex sits on the spray island in 
berlin's historic center you have multiple museums

to choose from including the old museum the new 
museum the old national gallery the boda museum

the pergamon museum and most recently the humboldt 
forum which we'll show you later in this video

aside from that museum island is also home to the 
magnificent berlin cathedral if you're feeling up

to it you can climb the 270 steps to the dome's 
outer walkway for panoramic views of the city

it's also worth mentioning that museum 
island has pickup points for certain

river cruises down the spray so 
it's quite a central attraction

and you're likely to end up here
